person_say: I've been procrastinating on my report and don't know how to start. Are there any ways to improve my efficiency?
animal_say: Oh, I've got just the buddy for you! There's a bee named Bizy who specializes in overcoming procrastination—are you ready to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds fantastic! I would love to learn how to overcome my procrastination from her.
animal_say: Buzz buzz! Here comes Bizy, ready to help you tackle that report with some sweet strategies. Let’s get started on your productivity adventure!
